participant_1.background:
I spend time with my dogs because they always make me laugh.
I do not wish to disclose my marital status.
I am the only member of my immediate family who is not employed by Sears.
I run and play frisbee with my dog.
I love to travel and explore, but I always make sure to spend time with my family, too.

participant_2.background:
I play the piano to relax and keep my mind off of my diabetes and fears.
I have been single for a while now and enjoy spending my time fishing and relaxing.
i have a dog that has behavioral issues.
mo mother worked as a nurse.
I enjoy eating at my local Thai restaurant because the food is delicious and the atmosphere is serene.

content.text: Hey! How is your day going?
It's going well! I'm just hanging out and relaxing, playing the piano to take my mind off of things.
That's great! I love playing the piano too! What kind of music do you play?
I play all sorts of music, but I mostly like to play classical and jazz.
Oh, that's awesome! I love jazz!
Me too! It's so relaxing and beautiful.
What's your favorite song to play?
It's hard to choose just one, but I really like to play "Autumn Leaves".
That's a great song! I love that one too.
Do you play any other instruments?
I used to play the guitar, but I haven't played in a while.
Oh, that's too bad. You should pick it up again!
Maybe I will!
What are some of your hobbies?
I love to travel, explore, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun!
It is! I love to see new places and meet new people.
Me too! I love to travel the world.
Where have you been to?
I've been to a lot of places, but my favorite place is Thailand.
Oh, that's awesome! I've never been to Thailand, but I've heard great things about it.
It's a beautiful country with amazing food and culture.
I'll have to put it on my list of places to visit.
You won't regret it!
